page.title: 01OUR BLOCK 01160651
page.content: Our block is to be found on the south west corner of{Islay}washed by the seas of the Atlantic Ocean and the North Channel.The principal communities,the villages of{ {Portnahaven}and{Port Wemyss}are built on adjacent estates and are divided by the Rainich burn-Portnahaven(Phort n' Abhainn,harbour of the river)is on the west and Port Wemyss on the east side. The original cottages of Portnahaven formed a semi-circle round the head of the bay,this was during the last century when the village was a thriving fishing community.Today the once important fishing industry survives on a small scale only with a few boats fishing for lobsters to be sent to the mainland markets.
